Our process

Our development process

Typical stages of a software development project

Analysis

–  Business interview & briefing
–  Development technical specifications
–  Approval technical specifications
–  Signing a contract

Design & Development

–  Prototyping of interfaces
–  Design development
–  Iterative development & Testing
–  Teaching & Transfer support

Support

–  Technical support of the solution
–  Improvements within the support
